mapper.update: update ujcms_model set site_id_ = #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_ = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scope_ = #{scope,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, order_ = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mains_ = #{mains,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, asides_ = #{asides,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, customs_ = #{customs,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ujcms_model (id_, site_id_, name_, type_, scope_, order_, mains_, asides_, customs_) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{siteId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scope,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mains,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{asides,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{customs,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
